snippet: Freddie Freeman was hitting .302 for the Atlanta Braves on May 5 when he scratched the cornea of his right eye while changing his contact lenses.
lead_paragraph: Freddie Freeman was hitting .302 for the Atlanta Braves on May 5 when he scratched the cornea of his right eye while changing his contact lenses.

headline.seo: Freddie Freeman’s Vision Problem Subsides, but Hitting Problem Lingers
headline.main: Vision Problem Subsides, but Hitting Problem Lingers for Freeman
headline.print_headline: Vision Problem Subsides, but Hitting Problem Lingers
